metadata.title: CVE-2019-12493 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer over-read exists in PostScriptFunction::transform inFunction.cc in Xpdf 4.01.01 because GfxSeparationColorSpace andGfxDeviceNColorSpace mishandle tint transform functions. It can, forexample, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftopstool. It might allow an attacker to cause Denial of Service or leak memorydata.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
